name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering cutting-edge software solutions tailored for healthcare and finance industries. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and adept at deploying **serverless** architectures using **Vercel**. Demonstrated expertise in building responsive and user-friendly designs leveraging **Tailwind CSS** and utilizing design platforms like **Figma**. Experienced in integrating LLM technologies from **OpenAI**, **Anthropic**, and **Google** for innovative applications in image and video generation, as well as audio generation. Skilled in developing robust data pipelines and managing async operations in line with modern API standards.

Hands-on experience with **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase** fuels strong backend capabilities. Committed to building scalable systems with effective **UI/UX** components while ensuring compliance with data standards. Proven ability to lead development on enterprise platforms embedding AI/ML functionalities aimed at enhancing real-time analytics and decision-making processes. Solid foundations in microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, and event-driven systems, ensuring the delivery of secure and maintainable solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions utilizing **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, and **React (17–18)** for healthcare and finance applications, ensuring compliance with industry regulations such as HIPAA and GDPR.
• Developed responsive user interfaces employing **Next.js** and **Tailwind CSS**, while leveraging **Figma** for UI/UX design, enhancing the overall user experience.
• Architected serverless solutions with **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions**, effectively optimizing application performance and reducing operational costs by **30%**.
• Implemented data pipelines using **PostgreSQL** and **async operations** to handle large volumes of healthcare and financial data, achieving a **50%** improvement in data retrieval times.
• Collaborated on building APIs that integrate AI capabilities, including **OpenAI** and **Anthropic**, for functionalities such as image and audio generation, enhancing application features.
• Led the transition of monolithic applications to a microservices architecture using **Docker** and **Vercel**, improving deployment frequency by **40%**.
• Developed engaging data visualization tools with **Chart.js** and **D3.js**, providing insights into transaction patterns and operational KPIs.
• Established robust testing frameworks utilizing Jest and PyTest to ensure code quality and reliability across development cycles, achieving a **95%** test coverage.
• Integrated advanced search functionalities using **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch** for efficient querying of unstructured health and financial data.
• Built creative solutions for personalized health and financial recommendations through the integration of LLMs and context engineering techniques, making use of vector databases and embeddings.

• Developed user-focused front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, ensuring responsive design and optimal performance for financial dashboards and admin portals.
• Designed and implemented robust API integrations to enhance system capabilities and enable seamless data flow between components, leveraging tools such as **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase**.
• Utilized **Git** for effective version control and collaboration on various projects, ensuring a streamlined development process.
• Applied **Tailwind CSS** to maintain consistent and responsive UI/UX across all applications, enhancing user interactions and visual appeal.
• Collaborated with design teams using tools like **Figma** to create wireframes and prototypes, aligning technical implementation with user-centered design principles.
• Developed dynamic data pipelines, integrating with external APIs and focusing on asynchronous operations to manage high-volume data processes efficiently.
• Engaged LLM technologies such as **OpenAI** and **Anthropic** for integrating AI functionalities, improving user engagement with innovative features in applications.
• Led the development and deployment of serverless solutions, enhancing system scalability while minimizing operational costs.
• Spearheaded projects involving image and video generation, contributing to advanced feature sets that leverage graphical content dynamically in applications.
• Implemented advanced machine learning techniques for audio generation and context engineering, enhancing application capabilities with data-driven insights.

Designed and optimized responsive frontend applications using **React (18)** and **Next.js**, ensuring exceptional UI/UX through efficient **TypeScript** integration and **Tailwind CSS** for styling, while focusing on cross-platform compatibility.
Implemented **APIs** and serverless architectures for swift asynchronous operations, enhancing interactiveness and user engagement across web applications.
Created dynamic data pipelines integrating **PostgreSQL** and **Supabase** for robust backend support, ensuring efficient data retrieval and storage, capable of handling up to **100k** user interactions concurrently.
Engineered advanced features utilizing **async operations**, employing **vector databases** and **embeddings** to store and process complex datasets in support of AI-driven functionalities.
Collaborated with design tools such as **Figma** to deliver pixel-perfect designs, optimizing responsive design aligned with accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1).
Integrated AI solutions utilizing **OpenAI** and **Anthropic** for context engineering and to develop innovative features such as LLM-powered chat interfaces and image generation capabilities, improving user engagement by over **30%**.
Implemented robust version control using **Git**, ensuring smooth team collaboration and maintaining stability across multiple feature branches in a rapid development environment.
Led efforts in building secure, user-friendly applications while maintaining compliance with data protection regulations and swift load times, achieving a **50%** reduction in page load times through optimized code and usage of caching strategies.
Conducted A/B testing and feature flag integration to assess new features, analyzing user feedback for continual improvement and enhancement of platform responsiveness.
